params.events: An array of GemEvents. Be aware that only gemEvents from the last CatalystApplied event onwards should be used to populate a query. If gemEvents from multiple CatalystApplied events are included the output values will be incorrect.

returns.values: An array of values for each gem present in the asset.

getAttributes(uint256,(uint16[],bytes32).notice: Returns the values for each gem included in a given asset.
